titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (Percentage) - Description

div.p: Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (Percentage) is a CLINICAL INVESTIGATION RESULT ITEM.
Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (Percentage) is the volume of air that can forcibly be blown out in one second, after full inspiration, as a 'Percentage (%)' of the predicted value.
